briefTitle: Text Message-Based Nudges Prior to Primary Care Visits to Increase Care Gap Closure
officialTitle: A Pragmatic Randomized Intervention Using Text Messages Prior to Primary Care Visits to Encourage Care Gap Closure: The PRIME Randomized Clinical Trial
conditions: Pneumonia, Pneumococcal, Diabetes Mellitus, Breast Cancer, Colorectal Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Age 18 or older
* Have documented consent to communicate electronically
* Have a visit scheduled with a primary care practice
* Have at least one open care gap among those in the intervention

Exclusion Criteria:

* No phone number on file to send text messages
